title: Digital Information Resource Utilization Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic library usage experience and fundamental information retrieval skills
context.additional_context: Customized training for improving job efficiency among in-service professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically search for professional information in academic databases with 80% or higher accuracy within six months
Learners can select credible materials with 90% accuracy by applying information resource evaluation criteria
Learners can design a digital information management system applicable to real-world tasks through project-based learning
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
